transcript: I want to marry you again if you came back crawling to me on your hands and knees because you're a vile, you're a mean, evil, minded little vampire and I hope to God I never sit eyes on you again.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I wouldn't marry you again if you came back crawling to me on your hands and knees because you're vile. You're a mean, evil-minded little vampire and I hope to God I never set eyes on you again.
